text: @realDonaldTrump Is that a book you are reading? Wait, you don’t read, a reality show you are watching? Wait, you’re not in it so no. Something with your hair? Help me, I’m lost on this. #DisinfectantDonnie #PinesolPresident #LiarinChief #Covid19 @CNN @FoxNewsSunday @LastWeekTonight

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Situation Room
entity.description: "The Situation Room With Wolf Blitzer" is the command center for breaking news, politics and extraordinary reports from around the world. Patterned after the concept of the White House Situation Room, CNN's lead political anchor Wolf Blitzer hosts newsmakers and experts to discuss and analyze the stories that are driving today's news.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: FOX News Sunday With Chris Wallace
entity.description: Journalist Chris Wallace moderates the Fox News political issues program, featuring interview with newsmakers of the day, focusing on the current topics and issues facing the country. The son of CBS newsman Mike Wallace, Chris Wallace also previously helmed the NBC weekend political show "Meet the Press."

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Death Row Stories
entity.description: CNN is by and large still a cable news outlet, but a movement under the leadership of network president Jeff Zucker to provide more alternative, entertainment-based programming is clearly afoot, and "Death Row Stories" is a prime example. The documentary -- the result of a collaboration with Academy Award-winning directors Robert Redford ("Ordinary People") and Alex Gibney ("Taxi to the Dark Side") -- revisits compelling capital murder cases in the U.S., detailing the twists and turns involved in each as a thought-provoking exercise on the death penalty and the American justice system. Redford's Sundance Productions also partnered with CNN for the documentary series "Chicagoland."

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
entity.description: The likeable, British-born pundit John Oliver is provided a unique platform to offer up his singular perspective and distinct voice to any number of social, political or existing issues.
